# Organization TELOS

**Organization:** {name}
**Last Reviewed:** {date}

---

## Purpose (Why We Exist)

{1-2 sentences - fundamental reason for existence. What problem does this organization solve? What would be missing from the world without it?}

## Mission (What We Do)

{1-2 sentences - how we fulfill purpose through action. What activities do we perform to achieve our purpose?}

## Values (How We Operate)

| Value | Meaning | Anti-Pattern |
|-------|---------|--------------|
| {value} | {what it means in practice} | {what violates it} |
| {value} | {what it means in practice} | {what violates it} |
| {value} | {what it means in practice} | {what violates it} |

## Vision (Where We're Going)

{2-3 sentences - 10-year aspirational state. What does success look like at scale?}

## Priority Framework (How We Decide)

When facing tradeoffs, we prioritize:

1. {highest priority} - {why this comes first}
2. {second priority} - {why this comes second}
3. {third priority} - {why this comes third}

## Contribution Focus (Our Unique Value)

{What makes us uniquely positioned? What can we do that others can't or won't?}

## What We Don't Do

{Explicit boundaries - outside our identity. What opportunities will we decline even if they seem attractive?}

- {boundary 1}
- {boundary 2}
- {boundary 3}

{Track identity-relevant learnings from features and projects. When work reveals something about who we are or should be, capture it here.}

## Review History

---

## Usage Notes

This template captures organizational identity using the TELOS framework (Purpose, Mission, Values, Vision, Priorities, Contribution, Boundaries).

**When to update:**
- Quarterly review (at minimum)
- After significant strategic decisions
- When learnings from features suggest identity evolution

**How to use in workflows:**
- Feature planning: Check alignment before starting work
- Product decisions: Reference priority framework
- Hiring/partnerships: Validate values alignment

**Related templates:**
- `docs/templates/product.md` - Product-level identity (inherits from org TELOS)
- `docs/templates/feature.md` - Feature specifications (references product identity)
